1a.gif.description: a scatter plot, with a loosely-clumped point cloud with a negative slope

1b1.gif.description: A scatter plot showing a linear (straight-line) relationship

A.gif.description: a scatter plot, with a tightly-clumped point cloud with a negative slope

B.gif.description: A scatter plot showing no relationship

C.gif.description: A scatter plot, having a tight point cloud with a positive slope

2WN.gif.description: a loose cluster of points moving from the top left to the bottom right
